item.title: Digikam Caveats - things to make sure using Digikam
item.description: I have been bitten. And so I post this in the hope that some needy soul finds this before he/she/it gets bitten too. Problem: Digikam saves image tags (ratings/captions that you spend hours editing) in its internal database. When you switch to a newer linux version, lose this information - unless you are careful enough to copy over the digikam.db4 file - which I was. The second problem is that if you move around or copy your files using a file browser, you lose this information ( !
